thread.title: Bay Area arts and entertainment picks, Oct. 12
thread.title_full: Bay Area arts and entertainment picks, Oct. 12 - SFGate

author: sfgate.com
title: Bay Area arts and entertainment picks, Oct. 12
text:
PlayGround: The monthly program of staged readings of new short plays continues with a one-night-only “ Planet Earth New Play Festival.” 8 p.m. Berkeley Repertory Theatre , 2025 Addison St., Berkeley. (415) 992-6677. www.playground-sf.org. 
Pavel Haas Quartet: The acclaimed Czech ensemble performs music by Prokofiev, Beethoven and Bartók. 7:30 p.m. SFJazz Center. www.performances.org. 
Jeffrey Anderson : The San Francisco Symphony’s principal tuba, who also teaches at the Conservatory, presents “OcTUBAfest,” a free evening of music for solo tuba and tuba ensemble. 8 p.m. San Francisco Conservatory of Music . www.sfcm.edu.
